description:
## Sheet Viewer - View an Excel sheet always on top and transparent

![Screenshot of Sheet Viewer](https://www.japplis.com/sheet-viewer/images/sheet-viewer-screenshot.png)

View an Excel sheet or CSV files on top of other windows.
        Select the sheet and which cells to show from the file.
        Defined the transparency of the window.
        Get notified when the data changes by a sound, bring the window back to front or show a green line around the window.
        Auto reload the file when changed.
        Possibility to edit the cells.
        
        Commercial: Free to try for one day.
summary: View an Excel sheet always on top and transparent
author: Japplis
